name: Domus Crawl (Francesco.Catalano)
description:
"Domus Crawl" is a 4 Player Cooperative Endless Runner realized in 3 days during "AIV Game-Jam 1" a school internal jam that included Programmers, Artists, and Game Designers from different class.

Each player controls one action of the same character, the objective is to avoid obstacles as much as possible, until the actions get shuffled among the players, who need to adapt the new control configuration.
